227.comments: VISA 241 227 will be delivered 100% online, with some synchronous (i.e., "real time") and some asynchronous components. This section of VISA 241 is reserved for students in the Bachelor of Media Studies (BMS) program.

228.comments: This section of VISA 241 is reserved for students in the Bachelor of Media Studies (BMS) program.

001.comments: VISA 241 001 will be delivered 100% online, with some synchronous (i.e., "real time") and some asynchronous components. If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.

002.comments: If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.

01W.comments: VISA 241 01W is a waiting list for VISA 241 001.Please be aware that, while we hope all interested students gain entry to the course, registration in the waiting list does not guarantee a space in the course. Students will be moved from the waiting list into the course, space permitting, in order of registration.

02W.comments: VISA 241 02W is a waiting list for VISA 241 002.Please be aware that, while we hope all interested students gain entry to the course, registration in the waiting list does not guarantee a space in the course. Students will be moved from the waiting list into the course, space permitting, in order of registration.

description: Introduction to digital photography image creation in relation to contemporary art. Emphasis on digital camera use, file management, and digital print production.  Only one of VISA 240 or VISA 241 may be used toward requirements for Major, Minor, or Honours programs in Visual Art.
